overview: Modern science is on the verge of fantasy. The latest achievements of scientists make it possible to do absolutely incredible things. The famous professor's daughter died. Using his laboratory, he clones her. And here she seems to be alive and well again. Now the clone starts to have problems, since the original did not differ from firm moral principles, but, simply put, was weak on the front. And now her former enthusiastic partners recognize her, demanding the continuation of the banquet ...
title: Cloning
